name: Tomorrow Morning
description:
A musician named Viola, who is about to release a new album the next day, gets haunted by a ghost at night and trapped in a dream.

There, she has to find melodies hidden throughout the house and play them on a piano in order to learn a lesson the ghost wants to teach her.

It's a simple relatively short RPG done as my second school project. It took about ten weeks to do and was a pretty exhausting thing to make.

You can find the soundtrack on Gamejolt.   https://gamejolt.com/games/tomorrow_morning/594128

If you enjoy the game leave a comment and consider donating if you have the means for it.

Thank You!
